name: NextGEN TinyMce Gallery Description
author: Dominik Matus (Marco Buttarini & Giorgio Martello & Andrea Brugnolo)

sections.description:
NextGEN TinyMce Description simply integrate tinymce wysiwyg to the description of the gallery in NextGEN gallery manager.

Credits

Originaly developed as NextGEN TinyMce Description by Marco Buttarini with the help of Andrea Brugnolo & Giorgio Martello. Customized by Dominik Matus.

TinyMce editor is included.

sections.installation:
1. Copy the plugin in wp-content/plugins directory

  2. Activate the plugin

  3. Go to your “manage gallery” on NextGEN, you will see description textarea modified. There is no configuration panel.

That’s it … Have fun

short_description: NextGEN TinyMce Description add tinymce to nextgen gallery description.
